{"step_by_step_thinking": "ZOE stands for Zinc Oxide Eugenol, which is a type of dental sealer. A. It is known to expand slightly upon setting, providing a tight seal. B. If extruded beyond the apex of the tooth, it can be absorbed by the body. C. It has antibacterial properties, which can help prevent the entombment of bacteria. D. However, ZOE is not known to cause increased inflammation due to its slow setting. In fact, it has soothing properties that can help reduce inflammation.", "answer_choice": "D"}
